creator: flaviocysne@gmail.com
text:
JUnit Request sampler is not converting variables in Constructor String Label field to their values.

In JUnitTestSamplerGui class, the method modifyTestElement is setting the constructorString property of JUnitSamper, when it should use the JUnitSampler.setProperty method to define a StringProperty with constructorLabel text.

Hello,
Could you provide a Test Plan with simple JUnit test class to speedup fix ?

Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
tejas.hadkar@ness.com
text:
I faces similar problem while passing parameters in Junit code using Jmeter's Junit sampler. PFA Java classes accepting parameter in different formats and jmx saved file.

Also I have included snapshots for the errors occurred during execution.
